name: yh_historical
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_complete.
Tool description: This API helps you to query stocks, quotes, movers and other financial summary.
API description: Retrieves the historical data for a given stock ticker within specified date ranges.

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the stock.

sdate.description: The start date for retrieving historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format.

edate.description: The end date for retrieving historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format.
